title: Merge Nintendo + PC controller options into Other on Service Request form

requirements.summary: Remove Nintendo and PC controller options from the Controller Platform select and have users choose "Other" for those controllers.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Service Request page, the Controller Platform dropdown no longer shows options for "Nintendo Switch Pro", "Nintendo Switch Joy-Con", or "PC/Generic".
The dropdown still includes an "Other" option that users can select instead for Nintendo and PC controllers.
Selecting and submitting the form with platform="Other" continues to work and includes "Platform: Other" in the submitted description payload as before.

file_operations.description: Update the Controller Platform <Select> option list to remove "Nintendo Switch Pro", "Nintendo Switch Joy-Con", and "PC/Generic", keeping "Other" as the catch-all selection; ensure the description formatting continues to include the selected platform (e.g., "Platform: Other").
